import MovieCard from './component/MovieCard' import Search from './component/Search' import './App.css' import React from 'react' import Home from './component/Navbar' // Image import Agneepath from './images/agneepath.jpg' import Friendzone from './images/Friendzone.jpg' import Dora from './images/dora.jpg' import Aladdin from './images/Aladdin.jpg' import {useState} from 'react' import Add from './component/Add' import Filter from './component/Filter' function App() { const [ Movies,setMovies ]=useState( [ {title: 'Agneepath' ,posterURL : Agneepath ,rating:' ' , description:' ' ,}, {title: 'Friendzone' ,posterURL : Friendzone ,rating:'' , description:'' ,}, { title: 'dora' ,posterURL : Dora ,rating:'' , description:'' ,} , { title: 'Aladdin' ,posterURL : Aladdin ,rating:'' , description:'' ,} ]) const [search,setSearch]=useState("") return (
) } export default App
